title: ninnE neranammiti (pv)
sahitya:
ninnE neranammiti gaNanAyaka natajana vighna vinAshana nirata


anupallavi

  munigaNa praNuta mangaLacarita muraLIkrSNa sahOdari suta
			(ciTTasvara sAhitya)
candruDu caviti dinamuna parihAsincagamadamaNaca shapincitivi
sharaNu gAvumanaga nIvatani kSaminci dayanu pApamupashamincitivi


caraNam 1    sumukha pAvana shrita sumukha nE nI pAdamE nammiti
    caraNam 2    narAdi vinutapada vAraNamukha bhayavAraNa varaguNa dAna vitaraNa
    caraNam 3    nI divya caritamE cadiviti krtArthuDaitini paravashaicitini
dayAmaya mAyAkrta galamula manninci sukrta niratuniga nanumalupu
    caraNam 4    vrkSa rUpa valarUpa nararUpulaiyunna nishAcaruLu muvvaranu
pakSirUpivai vArala vadhinciy kSitiki shAnti subhikSamosagina
    caraNam 5    vArANasinA krAmincina  durAsharuni durAsha nirAsha gAvimpa
vAmana rUpivai mincina parAkramamuna avirbhinci pAdamu
rAkAshitalapai niDi aNaci vadhinci rendava pAdamu kAshi tavamantA 
paraci kApADi paramAnda nantaTa nela golpina ninu pogaDa mEmenta
    caraNam 6    sarva jagamulaku gati jananI janakulEyani pArvatini
sAmbashivuni gani vandanamu salipi mummAru tirigi vacci nilicina
guNAkara vinAyakuni gani smita vadanamu merayu manasu mudamuna nalaraga
bhavuDu sarva gaNAdhipuDai alarumani dIvenalosagi ninniyaminci
